displayName.description:
Name of the language in ‘dialect’ form, to be displayed in the language selector.

⚠ DO NOT translate ‘American English’: it supposed to be translation for your target language; the one you're translating Modrinth to. E.g. if you're translating Modrinth to French, please translate this to ‘Français’, NOT ‘Anglais américain’.

Here are some examples:
• British English ⇒ British English
• Portuguese ⇒ Português
• Brazilian Portuguese ⇒ Português brasileiro
• German ⇒ Deutsch
• Swiss High German ⇒ Schweizer Hochdeutsch
• Simplified Chinese ⇒ 简体中文
• Traditional Chinese ⇒ 繁體中文.
